basic_info.name: KMMITS Placement
description: The Department of placement & training was established as a separate entity in the year 2008. The placement department started its activities to cater to the needs of providing high-quality placement services to the students of the Institution.

For training students with the necessary employability skills, the institute conducts various programs on Body Language, Resume Writing, Interview Skills, Group Discussions, overall personality development skills Viz., Goal Setting, Confidence Building, Motivation, Positive Thinking, Flexibility, etc., and other soft skills.

basic_info.name: KMMITS Faculty
description: The KMM Institute of Technology and Science has around 100 faculty members who are highly experienced and knowledgeable. Most of the faculty members are Associate Professors and have completed their education from the reputed institutes across India.
Check: KMM Institute of Technology and Science Faculty

faqs.question: Do sponsored candidates get admission to the KMM Institute?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. Sponsored seats are available. A candidate who is appearing for payment/sponsored seats must submit the application directly to the college.

faqs.question: Does KMM Institute have any reservation criteria for the category students?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. Category students get concessions in eligibility criteria. For candidates belonging to SC/ST, they should be passed in 10+2 or its equivalent with 50% average marks in Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics or Biology (MPC).

faqs.question: Does KMM Institute have its own library?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. KMM Library building spans over an area of 10,000 sq. ft. It has a seating capacity of 100 persons and follows an open access system with State-of-the-art facilities. Library houses a collection of 13,000 Books and 1000 Back Volumes.

faqs.question: How is the teaching methodology of the KMM Institute?
faqs.answer: Ans.KMM Institute of Technology and Science has qualified faculty members and they are assigned with various theory subjects to prepare course plans using the standard format provided by the institute. The classroom sessions at KMMITS are very interactive and will encourage the students to think independently and inspire their creativity. A high level of discipline will be maintained in the classroom. The instructional or lecture delivery of the faculty will be through a set of Educational Technology / Tools opted by the faculty.

Section.name: About KMMITS
Section.description:
KMM Institute of Technology and Science is a private institution, established in 2008 and is affiliated to the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Anantapur. KMMITS offers BTech, MBA, MTech, Diploma in Engineering courses at the UG and PG level. Admission to the courses offered by the institute will be done based on both merit and entrance basis.
KMMITS has a dedicated placement cell which conducts various activities such as quizzes, training sessions, group discussions etc. Some of the top recruiters of the institute are Reliance, Google, NIIT, Wipro, Cognizant, Flipkart etc.

The Department of placement & training was established as a separate entity in the year 2008. The placement department started its activities to cater to the needs of providing high-quality placement services to the students of the Institution.
For training students with the necessary employability skills, the institute conducts various programs on Body Language, Resume Writing, Interview Skills, Group Discussions, overall personality development skills Viz., Goal Setting, Confidence Building, Motivation, Positive Thinking, Flexibility, etc., and other soft skills.

Check: KMM Institute of Technology and Science Faculty
Ques. Do sponsored candidates get admission to the KMM Institute?
Ans. Yes. Sponsored seats are available. A candidate who is appearing for payment/sponsored seats must submit the application directly to the college.
Ques. Does KMM Institute have any reservation criteria for the category students?
Ans. Yes. Category students get concessions in eligibility criteria. For candidates belonging to SC/ST, they should be passed in 10+2 or its equivalent with 50% average marks in Physics, Chemistry & Mathematics or Biology (MPC).
Ques. Does KMM Institute have its own library?
Ans. Yes. KMM Library building spans over an area of 10,000 sq. ft. It has a seating capacity of 100 persons and follows an open access system with State-of-the-art facilities. Library houses a collection of 13,000 Books and 1000 Back Volumes.
Ques. How is the teaching methodology of the KMM Institute?
Ans. KMM Institute of Technology and Science has qualified faculty members and they are assigned with various theory subjects to prepare course plans using the standard format provided by the institute. The classroom sessions at KMMITS are very interactive and will encourage the students to think independently and inspire their creativity. A high level of discipline will be maintained in the classroom. The instructional or lecture delivery of the faculty will be through a set of Educational Technology / Tools opted by the faculty.
Ques. What is the intake capacity of the KMM Institute for its courses?
Ans. Intake seats according to specialization in KMM Institute of Technology and Science:

KMMITS Courses.Specialization: Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical And Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering
KMMITS Courses.Eligibility Criteria: Passed Class 12 in relevant discipline with an aggregate of at least 60% marks along with a valid AP EAMCET Score
Hold a Bachelor's degree in relevant discipline from a recognized university
